properties.title: Parco Avventura (Rope Park)
properties.abstract: Parco Avventura, an adventure rope park in San Bernardino, promises fun with a kick.
properties.description:
A thrilling experience amongst the trees at a height of up to 10 metres above the ground, the rope park is an experience for young and old alike. There are four courses, one of which is suitable for children under 1.20 meters.

The park is part of the San Remo Sports Centre, which also boasts a tennis court and a miniature golf course.
properties.name: Ente Turistico Regionale del Moesano
